description.english: Complete a web with 6+ sides without touching the ground.
description.spanish: Completa una telaraña con más de 6 lados sin tocar el suelo
description.french: Tisser une toile d'au moins 6 côtés sans toucher le sol.
description.german: Spinne ein Netz mit 6+ Seiten, ohne den Boden zu berühren.
description.italian: Completa una ragnatela con 6 o più lati senza toccare per terra.
description.brazilian: Faça uma teia com mais de 6 lados sem tocar no chão.
description.polish: Zbuduj sieć o sześciu lub więcej bokach bez dotykania podłoża.
description.russian: Сплетите паутину, имеющую не менее 6 сторон, не касаясь земли.

description.english: Trap all bugs, eat none.
description.german: Fange alle Insekten, friss aber keins.
description.french: Attraper tous les insectes, n'en manger aucun.
description.italian: Intrappola tutti gli insetti, ma non mangiarne nessuno.
description.spanish: Atrapa todos los bichos pero no te comas ninguno.
description.russian: Поймайте всех мошек, но не ешьте.
description.polish: Uwięź wszystkie owady, ale żadnego nie zjedz.
description.brazilian: Aprisione todos os insetos, não coma nenhum.

description.english: Build a web while maintaining a 5x web multiplier.
description.german: Spinne unter Beibehaltung eines 5x-Multiplikators ein Netz.
description.french: Tisser une toile en conservant un bonus de toile de x5.
description.italian: Costruisci una ragnatela mentre mantieni attivi un moltiplicatore di ragnatela 5x.
description.spanish: Construye una telaraña manteniendo un multiplicador de telaraña x5.
description.brazilian: Faça uma teia enquanto mantém um multiplicador de teias de 5x.

description.english: Collect an Atlas Moth.
description.german: Fang einen Atlasspinner.
description.french: Attraper un attacus atlas.
description.italian: Raccogli una falena atlas.
description.spanish: Recoge una polilla Atlas.
description.brazilian: Colete uma mariposa-atlas.

description.english: Collect a Coleophora Moth.
description.german: Fang eine Sackträgermotte.
description.french: Attraper un coléophore.
description.italian: Raccogli una falena coleophora.
description.spanish: Recoge una polilla Coleophora.
description.brazilian: Colete a traça.

description.english: Collect a Death's Head Moth.
description.german: Fang einen Totenkopffalter.
description.french: Attraper un acherontia.
description.italian: Raccogli un'acherontia.
description.spanish: Recoge una polilla de la muerte.
description.brazilian: Colete a borboleta-caveira.

description.english: Collect a Luna Moth.
description.german: Fang eine Lunamotte.
description.french: Attraper un actias luna.
description.italian: Raccogli un'actias luna.
description.spanish: Recoge una polilla Luna.
description.brazilian: Colete uma mariposa da Lua.

description.english: Collect a SwallowTail Butterfly.
description.german: Fang einen schwarzen Schwalbenschwanz.
description.french: Attraper un papillon du céleri.
description.italian: Raccogli una coda di rondine nera.
description.spanish: Recoge una mariposa cola de golondrina negra.
description.brazilian: Colete a Papilio polyxenes.

description.english: Earn Scholar or better rank in 30 levels.
description.german: Verdien dir über 30 Levels den Rang des Gelehrten oder besser.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Érudit ou mieux dans 30 niveaux.
description.italian: Ottieni il grado di erudito o uno migliore in 30 livelli.
description.spanish: Consigue el rango escolar o mejor en 30 niveles.
description.russian: Получите титул Книжника или выше за 30 уровней.
description.polish: Zdobądź rangę ucznia lub wyższą na 30 poziomach.
description.brazilian: Alcance o posto de Erudito ou melhor em 30 fases.

description.english: Tackle a hornet after eating 10 bugs in a combo.
description.german: Spring nach Fressen einer 10-Insekten-Kombo eine Hornisse an.
description.french: Attaquer un frelon après avoir mangé 10 insectes de suite.
description.italian: Attacca un calabrone dopo aver mangiato 10 insetti in una combo.
description.spanish: Ataca a un avispón después de comer 10 bichos en un combo.
description.polish: Zaatakuj bezpośrednio szerszenia po zjedzeniu 10 owadów w jednym kombo.
description.brazilian: Ataque uma vespa depois de comer 10 insetos em um combo.

description.english: Eat an insect exactly at midnight.
description.german: Friss genau um Mitternacht ein Insekt.
description.french: Manger un insecte à minuit pile.
description.italian: Mangia un insetto a mezzanotte in punto.
description.spanish: Cómete un insecto justo a medianoche.
description.brazilian: Coma um inseto exatamente à meia-noite.

description.english: Eat 33 fireflies.
description.german: Friss 33 Leuchtkäfer
description.french: Manger 33 lucioles.
description.italian: Mangia 33 lucciole.
description.spanish: Come 33 luciérnagas.
description.brazilian: Coma 33 vaga-lumes.

description.english: Swat 50 houseflies.
description.german: Schnapp dir 50 Stubenfliegen.
description.french: Écraser 50 mouches domestiques.
description.italian: Acchiappa 50 mosche.
description.spanish: Aplasta 50 moscas domésticas.
description.brazilian: Acerte 50 moscas domésticas.

description.english: Tackle a hornet while jumping from one web to another.
description.german: Spring eine Hornisse an, indem du von einem Netz zum anderen springst.
description.french: Attaquer un frelon en sautant d'une toile à une autre.
description.italian: Attacca un calabrone mentre salti da una ragnatela all'altra.
description.spanish: Ataca a un avispón mientras saltas de una telaraña a otra.
description.russian: Сбейте шершня, перепрыгнув с одной паутины на другую.
description.polish: Zaatakuj szerszenia, skacząc z jednej sieci na drugą.
description.brazilian: Ataque uma vespa enquanto salta de uma teia para outra.

description.english: Climb to the roof of Mansion South.
description.german: Klettere auf des Dach des Herrenhauses Süd.
description.french: Atteindre le toit du manoir sud.
description.italian: Arrampicati sul tetto della villa a sud.
description.spanish: Súbete al tejado del sur de la mansión.
description.russian: Вскарабкайтесь на крышу на Юге поместья.
description.polish: Wespnij się na dach południowej posiadłości.
description.brazilian: Suba até o telhado do Sul da Mansão.

description.english: Create a six-sided web.
description.german: Spinne ein 6-seitiges Netz.
description.french: Tisser une toile de six côtés.
description.italian: Crea una ragnatela a 6 lati.
description.spanish: Crea una telaraña de seis lados.
description.brazilian: Crie uma teia de seis lados.

description.english: Secret Achievement
description.german: Geheimer Erfolg
description.french: Succès secret
description.italian: Obiettivo segreto
description.spanish: Logro secreto
description.brazilian: Conquista secreta

description.german: Geheimer Erfolg
description.french: Succès secret
description.italian: Obiettivo segreto

description.spanish: Logro secreto
description.brazilian: Conquista secreta

description.english: Juggle a cricket or grasshopper three times.
description.german: Jongliere dreimal eine Grille oder einen Grashüpfer.
description.french: Faire sauter un grillon ou une sauterelle trois fois de suite.
description.italian: Destreggia un grillo o una cavalletta tre volte.
description.spanish: Haz malabarismos con un grillo o saltamontes tres veces.
description.polish: Podrzuć świerszcza lub konika polnego trzy razy, tak żeby nie dotknął podłoża.
description.brazilian: Faça malabares com um grilo ou gafanhoto três vezes.

description.english: Attain rank of Knight in 30 levels.
description.german: Erreiche über 30 Levels den Rang des Ritters.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Chevalier dans 30 niveaux.
description.italian: Ottieni la posizione di cavaliere in 30 livelli.
description.spanish: Consigue el rango de caballero en 30 niveles.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao posto de Cavaleiro em 30 fases.

description.english: Earn 50,000 points in less than 15 seconds.
description.german: Erziele in weniger als 15 Sekunden 50.000 Punkte.
description.french: Marquer 50 000 points en moins de 15 secondes.
description.italian: Ottieni 50.000 punti in meno di 15 secondi.
description.spanish: Consigue 50 000 puntos en menos de 15 segundos.
description.polish: Zdobądź 50 000 punktów w mniej niż 15 sekund.
description.brazilian: Faça 50.000 pontos em menos de 15 segundos.

description.english: Earn 32,500 points consuming only marshflies.
description.german: Friss ausschließlich Sumpfschnaken und erziele 32.500 Punkte.
description.french: Marquer 32 500 points en ne mangeant que des sciomyzidae.
description.italian: Ottieni 32.500 punti consumando solo mosche della palude.
description.spanish: Consigue 32 500 puntos consumiendo solo moscas de pantano.
description.polish: Zdobądź 32 500 punktów, jedząc wyłącznie muchy smętki.
description.brazilian: Faça 32.500 pontos consumindo somente moscas-do-pântano.

description.english: Max out both of your multipliers.
description.german: Maximiere deine beiden Multiplikatoren.
description.french: Maximiser deux de vos bonus.
description.italian: Massimizza entrambi i tuoi moltiplicatori.
description.spanish: Llena al máximo tus dos multiplicadores.
description.brazilian: Maximize os dois multiplicadores.

description.english: Trap 3 clusterflies in a 9-sided web.
description.german: Fang in einem 9-seitigen Netz 3 Schmeißfliegen.
description.french: Piéger 3 mouches des greniers dans une toile de 9 côtés.
description.italian: Intrappola 3 mosche della mansarda in una ragnatela a 9 lati.
description.spanish: Atrapa 3 moscones en una telaraña de 9 lados.
description.polish: Złap trzy muchy zwyczajne w sieć o dziewięciu bokach.
description.brazilian: Aprisione 3 moscas-varejeiras em uma teia de 9 lados.

description.english: Discover 5 ways to die.
description.german: Entdecke 5 Wege, den Löffel abzugeben.
description.french: Découvrir 5 façons de mourir.
description.italian: Scopri 5 modi di morire.
description.spanish: Descubre 5 maneras de morir.
description.polish: Znajdź pięć sposobów na utratę życia.
description.brazilian: Descubra 5 maneiras de morrer.

description.english: Spin 64 4-sided webs.
description.german: Webe 64 4-seitige Netze.
description.french: Tisser 64 toiles de 4 côtés.
description.italian: Crea 64 ragnatele a 4 lati.
description.spanish: Teje 64 telarañas de 4 lados.
description.brazilian: Teça 64 teias de 4 lados.

description.english: Attain rank of Knight for the first time.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal den Rang des Ritters.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Chevalier une première fois.
description.italian: Ottieni il grado di cavaliere per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Consigue el rango de caballero por primera vez.
description.russian: Получите титул Рыцаря в первый раз.
description.polish: Zdobądź po raz pierwszy rangę rycerza.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao posto de Cavaleiro pela primeira vez.

description.english: Tackle an insect just before dying of hunger.
description.german: Schnapp dir ein Insekt, bevor du vor Hunger stirbst.
description.french: Attaquer un insecte juste avant de mourir de faim.
description.italian: Attacca un insetto poco prima di morire affamato.
description.spanish: Ataca a un insecto justo antes de morir de hambre.
description.russian: Сбейте насекомое прямо перед голодной смертью.
description.polish: Zaatakuj owada bezpośrednio tuż przed śmiercią z głodu.
description.brazilian: Ataque um inseto exatamente antes de morrer de fome.

description.english: Trap a snakefly in a 7-sided web.
description.german: Fang in einem 7-seitigen Netz eine Kamelhalsfliege.
description.french: Piéger un raphidioptera dans une toile de 7 côtés.
description.italian: Intrappola una rafidia in una ragnatela a sette lati.
description.spanish: Atrapa una mosca serpiente en una telaraña de 7 lados.
description.polish: Złap wielbłądkę w sieć o siedmiu bokach.
description.brazilian: Aprisione uma mosca-serpente em uma teia de 7 lados.

description.english: Eat two insects with one tackle.
description.german: Friss mit einem Angriff gleich zwei Insekten.
description.french: Manger deux insectes sur une seule attaque.
description.italian: Mangia due insetti con un solo attacco.
description.spanish: Come dos insectos con un solo ataque.
description.polish: Zjedz dwa owady w jednym ataku.
description.brazilian: Coma dois insetos com um ataque.

displayName.english: The Sun, the Moon, and the Truth
displayName.german: Die Sonne, der Mond und die Wahrheit
displayName.french: Le soleil, la lune et la vérité
displayName.italian: Il sole, la luna e la verità
displayName.spanish: El sol, la luna y la verdad
displayName.brazilian: O Sol, a Lua e a Verdade

description.english: Investigate the Captain's Quarters.
description.german: Erkunde das Quartier des Kapitäns.
description.french: Examiner les quartiers du capitaine.
description.italian: Perlustra le abitazioni del capitano
description.spanish: Investiga las dependencias del capitán.
description.brazilian: Investigue a dependência do capitão.

description.english: Find something hidden in the Vault.
description.german: Finde im Kellergewölbe etwas Verborgenes.
description.french: Trouver une chose cachée dans la chambre forte.
description.italian: Trova qualcosa di nascosto nella cassaforte.
description.spanish: Encuentra algo oculto en la cámara de seguridad.
description.brazilian: Encontre algo escondido no cofre.

description.english: Discover a secret in the Study.
description.german: Enthülle in der Studierstube ein Geheimnis.
description.french: Trouver un secret dans l'étude.
description.italian: Scopri un segreto nello studio.
description.spanish: Descubre un secreto en el estudio.
description.brazilian: Descubra um segredo no escritório.

description.english: Witness an event in the Laboratory.
description.german: Sei Zeuge bei einem Ereignis im Labor.
description.french: Assister à quelque chose dans le laboratoire.
description.italian: Assisti a un evento nel laboratorio.
description.spanish: Presencia un suceso en el laboratorio.
description.brazilian: Testemunhe um evento no laboratório.

description.english: Build an 8-sided web that isn't strong.
description.german: Spinne ein 8-seitiges, nicht besonders starkes Netz.
description.french: Tisser une toile de 8 côtés et non solide.
description.italian: Costruisci una ragnatela a 8 lati non robusta.
description.spanish: Construye una telaraña de 8 lados que no sea fuerte.
description.polish: Zbuduj sieć o ośmiu bokach, która nie będzie wzmocniona.
description.brazilian: Crie uma teia de 8 lados que não seja forte.

description.english: Finish an incomplete secret society symbol.
description.german: Vollende ein unvollständiges Symbol des Geheimbundes.
description.french: Finir un symbole incomplet de la société secrète.
description.italian: Finisci un simbolo della società segreta incompleto.
description.spanish: Termina un símbolo de la sociedad secreta incompleto.
description.brazilian: Conclua um símbolo inacabado da sociedade secreta.

description.english: Tackle a dragonfly into a hornet.
description.german: Schnapp dir eine Libelle und greif damit eine Hornisse an.
description.french: Faire rebondir une libellule dans un frelon.
description.italian: Attacca una libellula dentro un calabrone.
description.spanish: Ataca a una libélula golpeando un avispón.
description.polish: Zaatakuj ważkę bezpośrednio, tak aby wpadła na szerszenia.
description.brazilian: Ataque uma libélula arremessando-a contra uma vespa.

description.english: Tackle all 5 gnats in a cluster in one jump.
description.german: Greif mit einem Sprung alle 5 Stechfliegen eines Schwarms an.
description.french: Attaquer un groupe de 5 moucherons en un seul saut.
description.italian: Attacca 5 moscerini in un gruppo con un solo salto.
description.spanish: Ataca a los 5 jejenes de un enjambre de un salto.
description.russian: Сбейте все 5 мошек роя одним прыжком.
description.polish: Zaatakuj bezpośrednio wszystkie pięć moskitów w skupisku w jednym skoku.
description.brazilian: Ataque todas as 5 muriçocas em um grupo com um salto.

description.english: Trap 10 insects in a 10-sided web.
description.german: Fang in einem 10-seitigen Netz ganze 10 Insekten.
description.french: Piéger 10 insectes dans une toile de 10 côtés.
description.italian: Intrappola 10 insetti in una ragnatela a 10 lati.
description.spanish: Atrapa 10 insectos en una telaraña de 10 lados.
description.polish: Złap dziesięć owadów w sieć o dziesięciu bokach.
description.brazilian: Aprisione 10 insetos em uma teia de 10 lados.

description.english: Complete a level in under thirty seconds.
description.german: Absolviere einen Level in unter dreißig Sekunden.
description.french: Finir un niveau en moins de trente secondes.
description.italian: Completa un livello in meno di 30 secondi.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel en menos de treinta segundos.
description.polish: Ukończ poziom w mniej niż 30 sekund.
description.brazilian: Termine uma fase em menos de trinta segundos.

description.english: Play the game under all 4 conditions.
description.german: Spiele das Spiel unter allen 4 Bedingungen.
description.french: Jouer au jeu dans les 4 conditions.
description.italian: Gioca in tutte e 4 le condizioni.
description.spanish: Juega al juego en las 4 condiciones.
description.russian: Поиграйте в игру во всех 4 условиях.
description.polish: Zagraj w grę we wszystkich czterech konfiguracjach warunków.
description.brazilian: Jogue o jogo sob todas as 4 condições.

description.english: Enter a code that is valid but expired.
description.german: Gib einen Code ein, der zwar gültig, aber schon abgelaufen ist.
description.french: Saisir un code valide mais ayant expiré.
description.italian: Inserisci un codice che è valido ma già scaduto.
description.spanish: Introduce un código que sea válido pero haya caducado.
description.russian: Введите правильный, но истекший по времени код.
description.polish: Wprowadź kod, który jest prawidłowy, ale wygasł.
description.brazilian: Digite um código válido, mas que venceu.

description.english: Eat 3 angry hornets without taking any damage.
description.german: Friss 3 wütende Hornissen, ohne selbst zu Schaden zu kommen.
description.french: Manger 3 frelons excités sans subir de dommages.
description.italian: Mangia 3 calabroni arrabbiati senza subire alcun danno.
description.spanish: Come 3 avispones enfadados sin recibir ningún daño.
description.russian: Съешьте 3 разозленных шершней, не получив никакого урона.
description.polish: Zjedz trzy rozwścieczone szerszenie, nie odnosząc żadnych obrażeń.
description.brazilian: Coma 3 vespas zangadas sem sofrer danos.
